front.title: Transmission of IPv6 over MS/TP Networks

abstract.t: Master-Slave/Token-Passing (MS/TP) is a medium access control method for the RS-485 physical layer, which is used extensively in building automation networks. This specification defines the frame format for transmission of IPv6 packets and the method of forming link-local and statelessly autoconfigured IPv6 addresses on MS/TP networks.
